title: Am i in the wrong division?
body: so i recently just started ranked, i went 8-2 placements and got placed gold 5, after i got placed i went onto winning another 2 which put me at a 10 win streak after this, i went on a straight 7 loss streak, i knew coming off this streak would hurt a little but im not sure if i belong in gold? Although i played pretty well during these losses. im not 100% sure halp :D {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
It's fairly common for players to go on large loss streaks, especially when they are adjusting to the new season and ranked environment. Your loss streak might be due to getting tilted or even just being a little unlucky.

As long as you keep playing well and not being a liability to your team, then you'll climb ranks. 

We can't really tell if you're supposed to be in gold or not. [OP.GG](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Noltdip) says your estimate **MMR** is below average for your rank, but considering that you were Platinum 5 last season, I think you'll get higher.

I hope this cleared things up a bit.

OP.GG means nothing, they are not officially Riot and therefore have no real say on what your MMR should be and whether it is higher or lower than normal, only what they THINK it should be and in comparison to everyone else on their own site.

Rioters themselves link to OP.GG from time to time and even mention use of their MMR calculator.

Likely because while it doesn't have the actual numbers use by Riot, it's calculations still are accurate to the form.
I don't see why, they have their own calculations and should be showing us that information, what are they scared of?

Most Rioters have no idea what the calcs are themselves.
It's only the people who actually work with the code that know it, and even then they don't see anyone's individual MMR.
thats the thing tho, this account was fresh made meaning i just got it to 30 like 2 weeks ago, so idk why it says i was plat 5 last season XD but cheers for the reply! LOL

alright so this is the go, i ended up getting demoted to silver 1  i thought to my self man this is legit hard af, i read up on how this guy went from silver to diamond in 3 months, so after reading that i decided im not going to play for wins or lp anymore im going to play to learn more, so instead of going straight for adc (my main role) i went for support, this being because i always complain to my self how i never have the perfect support, so i went into the first game playing blitz support i muted my whole team so i could focus on my game, i won the first game lost the second game then won the next 5 which got me back to gold 5, im not sure if this technique ive got down will work, but it has so far and im going to carry it on to see how far i get! gl me boiz!
